TextEng: No, stay here.
Fine, come with me.
No, stay here.
Yeah, you can come with me.
No, never mind.
Yes, come with me.
Never mind.
I think we need to part ways.
Alright, fine. Stay with me, then.
Wait here until I return.
Leave me. Now.
I'd like you to level up.
I want to change your tactics.
I don't want to change anything else right now.
I want to move faster and not bother with stealth or searching.
Text: 더 빨리 움직이고 싶어. 은신이나 탐색은 신경 쓰지 말고.

TextEng: I need you to be stealthy right now.
Don't help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest.
Text: 내가 잠긴 문이나 상자를 열지 못해도 도와주지 마.

TextEng: Help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest.
Text: 내가 잠긴 문이나 상자를 열지 못하면 도와줘.

TextEng: I want to change the distance you stay away from me.
Stay a long distance away from me.
Keep a medium distance.
Stay close.
Go ahead and attack as soon as you see enemies.
Defend me and don't attack until I do.
Text: 날 지켜주고 내가 공격할 때까지 기다려.

TextEng: I want to adjust your equipment.
Can you identify my equipment?
I want you to use your Barbarian Rage.
I need you to cast a spell.
Never mind.
No, that's it.
Ultravision.
True Seeing.
Summon Creature IX.
Summon Creature VIII.
Summon Creature VII.
Summon Creature VI.
Summon Creature V.
Summon Creature IV.
Summon Creature III.
Summon Creature II.
Summon Creature I.
Stoneskin.
Shield.
Shadow Shield.
See Invisibility.
Resistance.
Resist Elements.
Remove Curse.
Remove Blindness/Deafness.
Protection From Spells.
Protection From Elements.
Premonition.
Owl's Wisdom.
Mind Blank.
Mass Haste.
Mage Armor.
Light.
Lesser Mind Blank
Knock.
Invisibility Sphere.
Invisibility
Improved Invisibility.
Haste.
Greater Stoneskin.
Ghostly Visage.
Fox's Cunning
Find Traps.
Ethereal Visage.
Energy Buffer.
No, I've changed my mind.
Yes, go ahead.
Endure Elements.
Endurance.
Eagle's Splendour.
Create Undead.
Continual Flame.
Clarity.
Cat's Grace.
Bull's Strength.
I've changed my mind.
Cast it on my animal companion.
Cast it on my familiar.
Cast it on me.
Cast it on yourself.
Animate Dead.
What was it you wanted to say earlier?
Let's stop and talk for a moment.
We're done talking.
How is everything?
I want to discuss your training.
<StartAction>[Xanos will take 1 barbarian level for every 4 sorcerer levels.]</Start> Concentrate on both martial and magical studies.
Text: <StartAction>[자노스는 요술사 레벨 4마다 야만전사 레벨을 1 받습니다.]</Start> 무술과 마법 공부를 병행해.

TextEng: <StartAction>[No leveling change.]</Start> Keep studying as you are.
<StartAction>[Xanos will level up as sorcerer only.]</Start> Concentrate on magical studies.
<StartAction>[Xanos will level up as barbarian only.]</Start> Concentrate on your martial studies.
Where is your ring? The one Drogan gave us?
Text: 반지는 어디 있어? 드로건이 우리한테 준 거 말이야.

TextEng: And where do you keep it?
I wasn't trying to take it from you...
Have you thought about your future more since we last talked?
Text: 지난번 얘기한 이후로 미래에 대해 더 생각해봤어?

TextEng: Don't get all sentimental on me.
Yeah, tell me about it...
What do you mean?
Reality always tends to kick in eventually.
Remember your future, Xanos. Don't give up on it!
I don't think whining about it will do you any good.
What has changed?
I don't want to hear this.
I think you're making excuses. Shape up!
Better to stop before you fail.
Why?
You will?
It didn't affect me.
Affected you?
So what can be done?
Why are you telling me this?
Text: 왜 나한테 이런 얘길 하는 거야?

TextEng: You're getting weak, Xanos.
So tell me of the kingdom 'Gentle King Xanos' will rule.
Text: 그럼 '자애로운 왕 자노스'가 다스릴 왕국에 대해 얘기해봐.

TextEng: You seek a harmonious kingdom? I wouldn't have thought...
Text: 조화로운 왕국을 추구한다고? 생각도 못 했는데...

TextEng: You should create happiness for its own sake.
You weren't *that* troubled.
What are you saying?
Good. You were never really destined for greatness.
Text: 좋아. 넌 애초에 위대함의 운명은 아니었으니까.

TextEng: Are you giving up now?
Then what am I destined for?
Indeed...
That doesn't sound very selfless...
Self-preservation?
If those sorcerer-kings are all gone... do you think it's a good idea to follow them?
Text: 그 요술사 왕들이 다 사라졌다면... 그들을 따르는 게 좋은 생각이라고 생각해?

TextEng: You're building your base on the tyrants of old?
How so?
Where will you go after you have finished learning? What will you do?
Text: 배움을 마치고 나면 어디로 갈 거야? 뭘 할 건데?

TextEng: I wish you luck in your journey.
How barbaric!
A modest beginning.
Your empire and mine will clash eventually, you realize.
Text: 네 제국과 내 제국은 결국 충돌할 거란 걸 알지?

TextEng: Maybe I'll come and visit you someday.
I don't want to hear any more of this nonsense.
Text: 이런 헛소리는 더 듣고 싶지 않아.

TextEng: Good luck with that, then.
You'll try to conquer a city?
I think you'll need to work a bit more on it...
Text: 좀 더 다듬어야 할 것 같은데...

TextEng: A people person? Don't make me laugh.
You want to rant a bit more about yourself? Your path to power?
Text: 너 자신에 대해 더 떠들고 싶어? 권력으로 가는 길에 대해?

TextEng: You realize that eventually I'd have to kill you...
Text: 결국엔 내가 널 죽여야 할 거란 걸 알지...

TextEng: I've had just about enough with your egotism.
Seeking power for its own sake is not a good goal.
Text: 권력 자체를 위해 권력을 추구하는 건 좋은 목표가 아니야.

TextEng: How would you be better than any of the others?
Text: 다른 이들보다 어떻게 더 나을 건데?

TextEng: The only way to real power is to crush all who oppose you beneath your heel!
Text: 진정한 권력으로 가는 유일한 길은 반대하는 모든 이를 발 아래 짓밟는 거야!

TextEng: You'd actually be a decent person, then?
So you'd lie to them to keep them happy?
Text: 그럼 그들을 행복하게 유지하려고 거짓말할 거야?

TextEng: Perhaps you will do something useful.
Text: 뭔가 쓸모 있는 걸 하게 될지도 모르지.

TextEng: It's a wonder an incompetent like you could think up something like that.
Text: 무능한 네가 그런 걸 생각해낼 수 있다니 놀랍네.

TextEng: A simplistic theory.
You overestimate yourself, yet again, Xanos.
Basically, you just want to be king.
How can you possibly think you'd become so powerful?
Text: 어떻게 그렇게 강력해질 수 있다고 생각하는 거야?

TextEng: Why such a craving for power, Xanos?
Text: 왜 그렇게 권력을 갈망하는 거야, 자노스?

TextEng: Is there nothing else in your life?
It's always good to have a goal... if, perhaps, an inappropriate one.
Text: 목표를 갖는 건 항상 좋지... 부적절할 수도 있겠지만.

TextEng: You're pretty mouthy for a henchman.
A budding tyrant...
Absolute power corrupts absolutely.
I never said you were a monster!
Smarter? What do you mean?
You're pathetic.
Again?
How do you plan to keep it then?
You will never have more power than me!
Text: 넌 절대 나보다 강력해질 수 없어!

TextEng: Sounds kind of obsessive to me...
So you were picked on as a kid... so what?
Are you going to tell me how you ended up at Drogan's now?
Text: 이제 어떻게 드로건한테 오게 됐는지 말해줄 거야?

TextEng: You could try explaining, you know.
You tend to get wrapped up in yourself a lot...
Just get on with it.
Some people never change.
Unlike now...
Don't be so hard on yourself.
Everyone has things they regret doing.
Some people never change...
Cry me a river.
So they drove you out, did they?
Let's see this 'true might' then.
Well, 'mighty Xanos', shall we continue?
I am not impressed.
You're kind of funny in a plotting-to-take-over-the-world kind of way.
Text: 세계정복을 꿈꾸는 의미에서 좀 웃기긴 하네.

TextEng: So how did you end up coming to Drogan in the first place?
Text: 그래서 애초에 어떻게 드로건한테 오게 됐어?

TextEng: You're right... It isn't very interesting, I guess.
Text: 맞아... 그다지 흥미롭진 않은 것 같네.

TextEng: You know, this attitude is really getting old.
More likely you'll be remembering *me*!
Text: 네가 *나*를 기억하게 될 가능성이 더 높아!

TextEng: You sure think a lot of yourself, don't you...
Do not let your obsessions consume you.
I've heard enough of your monomaniacal ranting!
You're set on this path?
What has shown this?
And what is this destiny?
What about the past? It is gone.
The power shall be mine alone!
You should learn not to abuse power...
Text: 권력을 남용하지 않는 법을 배워야 해...

TextEng: Whatever it takes? Anything?
Text: 뭐든지 해야 한다고? 무슨 수를 써서든?

TextEng: Would you believe I'm interested?
Just humor me.
No, not just yet.
Yes, come with me.
It wasn't exactly intentional.
Heurodis will die, plain and simple.
We should bide our time.
Heurodis called it Undrentide.
Maybe it's better if you remained behind.
Text: 넌 뒤에 남는 게 나을지도 몰라.

TextEng: Fine. But remember what we're here to do.
Text: 좋아. 하지만 여기 온 이유를 기억해.

TextEng: No. You definitely need to stay here.
Text: 안 돼. 넌 여기 남아야 해.

TextEng: Come with me, then. We've much to do.
Text: 그럼 같이 가자. 할 일이 많아.

TextEng: Maybe so. Don't get any big ideas, however.
Text: 그럴지도. 하지만 과한 생각은 하지 마.

TextEng: I am not a slave, no matter what Ashtara thinks.
Text: 아슈타라가 뭐라고 생각하든, 난 노예가 아니야.

TextEng: A 'thank you' would not be out of the question.
Try not to look her in the eyes again, then.
Text: 그럼 다시는 그녀 눈을 쳐다보지 마.

TextEng: I won't let it happen to me again.
Text: 다시는 그런 일 안 당할 거야.

TextEng: It's good to see you, too...
I think I can do just fine on my own right now.
Text: 지금은 혼자서도 잘할 수 있을 것 같은데.

TextEng: That would be a good idea.
I'm going to head out and look for master Drogan's stolen artifacts, but he suggested I take someone with me.
Text: 드로건 스승님의 도난당한 유물들을 찾으러 나갈 건데, 누군가 같이 데려가라고 하시더라고.

TextEng: If you really have a problem with it, I'll check with the others.
Yeah, I think you do.
If you see him, tell him to go ahead and talk.
What is it you want, exactly?
You seem to talk on behalf of this Xanos quite a bit.
Text: 이 자노스를 대변하는 걸 꽤 자주 하는구나.

TextEng: You? Or Xanos? I get confused.
Yes, poor Xanos.
I'll have to remember to thank him for the sympathy, then.
I don't have time to listen to you now...
And what does Xanos wish to say?
I will find anything valuable, don't worry.
Text: 가치 있는 건 다 찾을 테니 걱정 마.

TextEng: And why are you so interested by who made it?
Text: 누가 만들었는지 왜 그렇게 관심 있는 거야?

TextEng: Who could have made this?
Ancient magic?
You can't be so sure.
You mean...
Perhaps what?
So?
What do you mean?
What's the problem?
We do what we must.
If you want to be a coward, feel free.
Don't worry; I'll be fine.
If you don't think you can handle it...
I don't know.
Then we must retrieve them no matter what!
Text: 그럼 무슨 일이 있어도 되찾아야 해!

TextEng: If I could harness that power...
If only master Drogan could tell us more...
Text: 드로건 스승님이 더 말씀해주실 수만 있다면...

TextEng: We will proceed with caution then.
It doesn't matter. We must get those artifacts!
What are you suggesting?
I'm not afraid of the kobolds!
What do you mean?
Getting cold feet, Xanos?
You're concerned about elven tombs?
Stop being such a wimp and let's get going.
I'll protect you, don't worry.
We won't die, Xanos.
You think I care what you want?
Text: 네가 원하는 게 뭔지 신경 쓸 것 같아?

TextEng: Why so vehement, Xanos?
Text: 왜 그렇게 격렬하게 구는 거야, 자노스?

TextEng: We'll all have revenge for what they did to master Drogan.
Text: 드로건 스승님한테 당한 일에 대해 다 같이 복수할 거야.

TextEng: I would think that people here would be more enlightened.
Text: 여기 사람들은 더 개화됐을 줄 알았는데.

TextEng: Then we shouldn't waste any more time here.
Don't get all sentimental.
So you will protect them?
He was always a kindly old man... the fool.
Not everyone only sees what's on the outside.
Well you have to admit: you are a brute.
Don't be so bitter, Xanos.
I was never a pet student!
I've worked harder than any of you!
Maybe we should return to master Drogan...
Whatever you say, Xanos.
We shall find them together.
You always were an egotist Xanos. Don't overestimate yourself.
Text: 자노스, 넌 항상 이기주의자였어. 자신을 과대평가하지 마.

TextEng: We should have a plan before getting in over our heads.
Text: 일이 꼬이기 전에 계획을 세워야 해.

TextEng: Then we should get going!
We may not get another chance...
I don't really care what you have to say.
Text: 네가 뭐라고 하든 신경 안 써.

TextEng: Death is always a possibility.
Our victory is assured, don't worry.
You will be welcome to travel by my side.
I don't need you to beat Heurodis.
Text: 헤우로디스를 이기는 데 네가 필요하진 않아.

TextEng: As you should.
Thank you, Xanos.
What is it?
If they haven't, we're lost.
Would the Asabi know?
We'd better be on our guard then.
Where would they be in the city then?
I don't need any Winds to defeat Heurodis!
Text: 헤우로디스를 이기는 데 바람 따위 필요 없어!

TextEng: Of course they did.
It doesn't matter if it'll work or not... she's going to try.
Text: 성공하든 안 하든 상관없어... 어차피 시도할 거잖아.

TextEng: We won't fail. Remember destiny.
Maybe where she fails, I can succeed.
Text: 그녀가 실패한 곳에서 내가 성공할 수 있을지도.

TextEng: Let's hurry up then.
It will all be mine!
Our task is more important than that!
Then let's get to it.
You're right. It's too old.
Why not?
Don't be such a weakling.
It's hard on me too.
What do you mean?
You would think he would have sacrificed you instead.
Text: 차라리 널 희생시켰어야 하는 거 아니야.

TextEng: There is nothing that can be done now.
Text: 이제 할 수 있는 건 없어.

TextEng: He gave his life for everyone.
Maybe he just lied to make you feel better.
We must honor his memory with our deeds.
Text: 우리의 행동으로 그분의 기억을 기려야 해.

TextEng: His spirit is watching over us, Xanos.
Text: 그분의 영혼이 우리를 지켜보고 계셔, 자노스.

TextEng: HAHAHAHAHA!
You're a henchman. Shut up and hench.
Text: 넌 종자야. 입 다물고 일이나 해.

TextEng: I am more than capable, Xanos.
Then we have to kill the master.
The mythallar will be safe with me.
We can't allow that to happen.
I don't like it either, Xanos.
And what am I supposed to do about it?
So why did you come, then?
Quit your whining, Xanos.
I've wondered about that, myself.
What would you rather we be doing?
You don't think that's important?
If we know why she wants the crystal, we might know how to defeat her.
Text: 그녀가 왜 수정을 원하는지 알면 어떻게 이길지 알 수도 있어.

TextEng: And just where would we look for her?
You make a lot of sense.
Well, we don't seem to have a choice, as you said.
Text: 말한 대로 선택의 여지가 없는 것 같아.

TextEng: We also stand to gain significant rewards.
What? Are you afraid of a little danger?
There's a stinger behind you.
Master Drogan is a Harper, and we are helping him.
Text: 드로건 스승님은 하퍼고 우린 그분을 돕고 있어.

TextEng: Perhaps I could have refused. Too late now.
I think you underestimate the possibilities here.
Are you kidding? This is an adventure!
I owe Master Drogan a lot. This is the least I can do.
Text: 드로건 스승님께 빚진 게 많아. 이 정도는 해야지.

TextEng: I want revenge, plain and simple.
Oh, joy.
You like hearing yourself talk, don't you?
Is that so?
Don't force me to kill you, Xanos.
Complain silently, then, if you must.
Let's go.
Stay here.
